concept.title: Smith-Corona Typewriter Cases and Care Considerations
concept.shortdesc: Protective storage cases for Smith-Corona typewriters have specific care needs that should be considered.

section.title: Smith-Corona Holiday Case
section.p: Portable Smith-Corona machines are commonly stored in a case known as the “Holiday Case.” The Holiday Case is slightly larger than standard typewriter carriers, and can be disassembled. Holiday Cases are made of a non-porous material that resists staining, allowing most marks to be removed with mild soap and water.

section.title: Alternate Case Styles
section.p: Some typewriters may be found in different styles of cases. The care process for alternate typewriter cases varies based on the case's materials and construction.
Alternate typewriter cases may have hinges that need to be unscrewed for removal. The typewriter case's material will determine the best cleaning solution to use.

section.note: Typewriter cases made of leather, cloth, or carpet may require careful selection of cleaning detergents. Research and patch test all detergents and cleaners before you apply them to your typewriter to prevent damage or discoloration.
